product_name: Royal Robbins Daisy Chain Shirt - Women's
long_description: A delicate floral pattern adorns the Royal Robbins Daisy Chain Shirt. It's a summer-weight, crinkly cotton that'll keep you cool on the hottest days. 100% cotton shirt is garment washed for softness. Button tabs hold rolled-up sleeves. Contrast fabric inside back yoke. Royal Robbins Daisy Chain Shirt features chest pockets with button closure and a shirttail hem.
short_description: A delicate floral pattern adorns the Royal Robbins Daisy Chain Shirt. It's a summer-weight, crinkly cotton that'll keep you cool on the hottest days.
